Unfaire Killer, schlechte und unfaire ques fÃ¼r Killer (z.B. versuche Legion zu lernen und komme ineine que voller 1 survivor die Toxic sind und richtig rein Tryharden und am es am ende auch noch wagen Baby Legion rein zu schreiben) dadurch kann man weder den Killer lernen noch hat man SpaÃŸ daran.
Und viiiiieeeell zu oft spielen Leute die Hexe die viel zu overpowerte Perks hat.
Die meiÃŸten Killer tunneln, sluggen oder campen, aber man muss auch sagen, dass es manchmal einige wirklich coole gibt.
Trotzdem ist das Spiel nur gut, wenn man wenigstens 3 weitere Leute hat mit denen das Spiel zocken kann oder sein Leben sowieso schon ScheiÃŸe ist.
Und am ende gibts noch mates die mit dem Killer spielen oder eigene mates bis mindestens  zur zwweiten Stufe am Harken lassen, die werden dafÃ¼r belohnt und wenn du deswegen leftest weil die trollen kriegst du ne strafe.
Inkompetentes balancing, inkompetentes matchmaking, schlechte maps, trollende mates, toxische killer, manchmal framedrops auf 5 FPS, einfach nur ein erbÃ¤rmliches und schlechtes "Spiel"

Best horror game ever. Lots of fun, tons of characters, and a way to buy DLC characters with in-game currencies. Imagine how bland this would be if perks weren't a thing (although it still would be kinda fun).
Najlepsza gra w tym klimacie ! Uwielbiam :)

First things first. This game is amazing and I would recommend this to everyone. This game has its fair share of problems and I will get to that later. 

1. The time each game takes is roughly 20 mins. This makes it not to big of a commitment to play, which I LOVE! Id like to see a bigger punishment against people who kill themselves on purpose and people who disconnect due to not wanting to play against certain players/getting pissed off. The game is short just commit. 9/10

2. The "grind". I see so many people complaining about some kind of "grind" in this game. There is very little actual "grind". Once you get your first few perks you like, you can slowly get the rest. You can only use 4 perks at once. After you get your pref. build bloodpoints just seem to stack up. As for killer.. you get bbq and chili from cannibal and "grind" the rest for a few hours until you get a build you like. This is game is low/medium grind. 10/10

3. No pay to win in this game. All payments are for killers(who you can buy with in-game currency) or skins. You cannot buy bloodpoints. You cannot buy shards. Once you have the game, you can play the rest of the game for free. Maps are all played free as well. Good job BH! 10/10

4. Playability. I can play this game over and over. It doesnt feel to repetitive even though it kind of is. Sure, you try to repair 5 gens every game, and run away every game, every game feels different. Different team / Different killer most of the time. Different killer builds / You can change your survivor build. 9/10

5. "Ranking system". - Its hard to get rank 1 at first. Once you get it, Its pretty easy in my opinion to maintain or get in the future in my opinion. If you play often, youll get it. If you queue as a red rank survivor with rank 20 friend / friends.. youll probably go against a rank 15/20 killer. F. 4/10

Are there bugs? Yes
Do you get hit sometimes when you dont think you should have been? Yes
Does this game make you upset sometimes? Yes
Its a game ;) youll get over it - and enjoy it sometimes. I just tend to laugh when I get hit in weird spots / or if I die to bugs. Sometimes ill get mad but its okay. Its a game.

Matchmaking is garbage. Community is toxic. There's not a whole lot going for it. Unless you have friends that play and you play a "Custom Game." There's so many bugs it makes Skyrim seem flawless, but at least Skyrim can be modded. Don't waste your money. And if you have bought it and you're thinking about picking it back up? Don't you got out.
i like the tactics and customization. it's actually a very tactic game

This game has occupied the last four years of my life. I have met so many wonderful people whilst playing this game. The gameplay loop is just splendid and has kept me addicted. Anyways, this has more bugs than a run down college dorm and costs $10 per cosmetic. Please dont make the same mistake i did and buy this.
